name: Exterminus (JamesTKhan)
description:
Submitted for the LibGDX September 2022 Game Jam! Chrome browser is recommended.

Contains mild violence and profanity.

Description

Incoming data burst[Scout Drone Unit]: Thermal anomaly detected. Approximately 100 human survivors located[Coordinates\Query(?)][X{105.3N-37.7S}]

Response[PrimeALEXA]: Insert -Prime Directive- Programming initiated. if/humansdetected/ Eliminate{1)True

Override_[PrimeALEXA]: Assuming direct drone control. Eliminate possible threats. Conserve power at all costs. Prevent re-infection.

Controls
Left Click- Dumb-Fire Missile
Right Click-Guided Missile Mode
M- Open in-game menu
F- Fullscreen (HTML only)

Credits

Programming: James "JamesTKhan" Pooley
3D Models: Eric Nigh
Logo/AI Voice: Mike Adcock
Buck Johnson Voice: Gary Manist
Human Voices: Mike Hays
